abstract: Facebook and Twitter were used to peddle stocks in a classic “pump and dump” fraud of about $7 million that was uncovered during a cocaine-trafficking probe, federal prosecutors said.

lead_paragraph: It seems that someone has found a way, albeit illegal, to make money off social networking: defrauding investors.

headline.main: Facebook and Twitter Used in Stock Fraud
